name: Lily the Bee (Hyblis29)
description:
Story This is the story of Lily the bee,     against moths threatening her hive,     each time trying to stay alive,     which is now a kind of monotony.     Some nectar can help her,     quitting this boring loop,     but will this kind of soup,     get her into another?   Controls
  • ← → : Move the Bee
  • Space: Shoot
  • Enter: Drink nectar
Softwares & ressources 
  • Unity & Visual Studio 
  • Krita 
  • Tracktion Waveform & Audacity 
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/schoolwork.font
Credits 

 Video game made for Ludum Dare 47!

  • Drawings & animations: Hyblis29
